      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>4b728323-ec30-11d7-8380-000acd021b2b#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az első világháború egyik legborzalmasabb fegyvere: a harci gáz</string>
            <string language="en">The most terrible weapon of the Second World War is the war gas </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die schrecklichste Waffe des zweiten Weltkrieges 
ist- das Krieggas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'arme la plus terrible de la deuxième guerre 
mondiale est le gaz de guerre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A arma a mais terrível da segunda guerra de 
mundo é o gás da guerra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'arma più terribile della seconda guerra 
mondiale è il gas di guerra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πιό φοβερό όπλο του δεύτερου παγκόσμιου πολέμου 
είναι ο πόλεμος αέριο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La arma más terrible de la segunda guerra 
mundial es el gas de la guerra</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Kutya gázálarcban</string>
            <string language="en">Dog in gas mask</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">,  vegyi fegyver,  harc,  erőszak,  </string>
            <string language="en">chemical weapon, fight, force</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hund in der Gasmaske</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chien dans le masque de gaz</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cão na máscara de gás</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Cane in maschera antigas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το σκυλί καλύπτει αέριο</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Perro en careta antigás</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Waffe, Kampf, Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">arme chimique, combat, force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">arma química, luta, força</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">arma chimica, lotta, forza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χημικό όπλο, πάλη, δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">arma química, lucha, fuerza</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
